verses.verse: And afterward <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> that they may celebrate <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2287><s%> to Me in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>'"

But Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Who <S%H4310><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that I should obey <S%H8085><s%> His voice <S%H6963><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>? I do not know <S%H3045><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and besides, <S%H1571><s%> I will not let <S%H7971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>"

Then they said, <S%H559><s%> "The God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> has met <S%H7122><s%> with us. Please, <S%H4994><s%> let us go <S%H1980><s%> a three <S%H7969><s%> days' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> that we may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> He fall <S%H6293><s%> upon us with pestilence <S%H1698><s%> or <S%H176><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>"

But the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> do you draw <S%H6544><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> away <S%H6544><s%> from their work <S%H4639><s%>? Get <S%H1980><s%> [back] to your labors! <S%H5450><s%>"

Again Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Look, <S%H2005><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> are now <S%H6258><s%> many, <S%H7227><s%> and you would have them cease <S%H7673><s%> from their labors! <S%H5450><s%>"

So the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> over the people <S%H5971><s%> and their foremen, <S%H7860><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"You are no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H3254><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> to make <S%H9226><s%> brick <S%H9226><s%> as previously <S%H8543><s%>; <S%H8032><s%> let them go <S%H1980><s%> and gather <S%H9535><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> for themselves. <S%H1992><s%>

"But the quota <S%H4971><s%> of bricks <S%H3843><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they were making <S%H6213><s%> previously, <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> you shall impose <S%H7760><s%> on them; you are not to reduce <S%H1639><s%> any <S%H4480><s%> of it. Because <S%H3588><s%> they are lazy, <S%H7503><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they cry <S%H6817><s%> out, 'Let us go <S%H1980><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to our God. <S%H430><s%>'

"Let the labor <S%H5656><s%> be heavier <S%H3513><s%> on the men, <S%H376><s%> and let them work <S%H6213><s%> at it that they may pay <S%H8159><s%> no <S%H408><s%> attention <S%H8159><s%> to false <S%H8267><s%> words. <S%H1697><s%>"

So the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> and their foremen <S%H7860><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out and spoke <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> 'I am not going to give <S%H5414><s%> you [any] straw. <S%H8401><s%>

'You go <S%H1980><s%> [and] get <S%H3947><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> for yourselves wherever <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> you can find <S%H4672><s%> [it;] but none <S%H369><s%> of your labor <S%H5656><s%> will be reduced. <S%H1639><s%>' "
So the people <S%H5971><s%> scattered <S%H6327><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to gather <S%H9535><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%> for straw. <S%H8401><s%>

And the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> pressed <S%H213><s%> them, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Complete <S%H3615><s%> your work <S%H4639><s%> quota, <S%H4639><s%> [your] daily <S%H3117><s%> amount, <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as when you had <S%H1961><s%> straw. <S%H8401><s%>"

Moreover, the foremen <S%H7860><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Pharaoh's taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> had set <S%H7760><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them, were beaten <S%H5221><s%> and were asked, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4069><s%> have you not completed <S%H3615><s%> your required <S%H2706><s%> amount <S%H2706><s%> either <S%H1571><s%> yesterday <S%H8543><s%> or <S%H1571><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> in making <S%H9226><s%> brick <S%H9226><s%> as previously <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%>?"

Then the foremen <S%H7860><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and cried <S%H6817><s%> out to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> do you deal <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H3541><s%> way <S%H3541><s%> with your servants <S%H5650><s%>?

"There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> yet they keep saying <S%H559><s%> to us, 'Make <S%H6213><s%> bricks! <S%H3843><s%>' And behold, <S%H2009><s%> your servants <S%H5650><s%> are being beaten; <S%H5221><s%> but it is the fault <S%H2398><s%> of your [own] people. <S%H5971><s%>"

But he said, <S%H559><s%> "You are lazy, <S%H7503><s%> [very] lazy; <S%H7503><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> you say, <S%H559><s%> 'Let us go <S%H1980><s%> [and] sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>'

"So go <S%H1980><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> [and] work; <S%H5647><s%> for you shall be given <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> straw, <S%H8401><s%> yet you must deliver <S%H5414><s%> the quota <S%H8506><s%> of bricks. <S%H3843><s%>"

And the foremen <S%H7860><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that they were in trouble <S%H9563><s%> because they were told, <S%H559><s%> "You must not reduce <S%H1639><s%> [your] daily <S%H3117><s%> amount <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of bricks. <S%H3843><s%>"
When they left <S%H3318><s%> Pharaoh's presence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> they met <S%H6293><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> as they were waiting <S%H5324><s%> for them.

And they said <S%H559><s%> to them, "May the Lord <S%H3068><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> upon you and judge <S%H8199><s%> [you,] for you have made <S%H887><s%> us odious <S%H887><s%> <S%H7381><s%> in Pharaoh's sight <S%H5869><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> us."

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "O Lord, <S%H136><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> hast Thou brought <S%H7489><s%> harm <S%H7489><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>? Why <S%H4100><s%> didst Thou ever <S%H2088><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> me?

"Ever since <S%H9241><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> in Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> he has done <S%H7489><s%> harm <S%H7489><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> and Thou hast not delivered <S%H5337><s%> Thy people <S%H5971><s%> at all. <S%H5337><s%>"
